abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: The Pokemon's STAB modifier becomes 2x.

abilities.name: Aerilate
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is knocked out with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. If any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability, this effect is prevented.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.description: The power of this Pokemon's move is multiplied by 1.3 if it is the last to move in a turn. Does not affect Doom Desire and Future Sight.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted if any opposing Pokemon has an attack that is super effective on this Pokemon, or an OHKO move. Counter, Metal Burst, and Mirror Coat count as attacking moves of their respective types, while Hidden Power, Judgment, Natural Gift, Techno Blast, and Weather Ball are considered Normal-type moves.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Fire-type attack.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to ballistic moves. Ballistic moves include Bullet Seed, Octazooka, Barrage, Rock Wrecker, Zap Cannon, Acid Spray, Aura Sphere, Focus Blast, and all moves with Ball or Bomb in their name.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 2 stages for each of its stat stages that is lowered by an opposing Pokemon.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has a stat stage raised it is lowered instead, and vice versa.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, Explosion, Mind Blown, Self-Destruct, and the Aftermath Ability are prevented from having an effect.

abilities.name: Defeatist
abilities.description: While this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, its Attack and Special Attack are halved.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 2 stages for each of its stat stages that is lowered by an opposing Pokemon.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack or Special Attack is raised by 1 stage based on the weaker combined defensive stat of all opposing Pokemon. Attack is raised if their Defense is lower, and Special Attack is raised if their Special Defense is the same or lower.

abilities.name: Drizzle
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.

abilities.name: Air Lock
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.description: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

abilities.name: Forecast
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is a Castform, its type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the move with the highest power, at random, known by an opposing Pokemon.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held items of all opposing Pokemon.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: When this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, it uses certain Berries early.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has a major status condition, its Attack is multiplied by 1.5; burn's physical damage halving is ignored.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: If the last item this Pokemon used is a Berry, there is a 50% chance it gets restored at the end of each turn. If Sunny Day is active, this chance is 100%.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.description: There is a 30% chance of curing an adjacent ally's major status condition at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.description: The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved, and burn damage taken is halved.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and the accuracy of its physical attacks is multiplied by 0.8.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: This Pokemon has its major status condition cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: No competitive use.

abilities.name: Illusion
abilities.description: The wielder appears as the last Pokemon in the party to the opponent.

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

abilities.name: Imposter
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it. If there is no Pokemon at that position, this Pokemon does not Transform.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves ignore substitutes and the opposing side's Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist and Aurora Veil.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opposing Pokemon by 1 stage. Pokemon behind a substitute are immune.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a Dark-type move.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: This Pokemon's held item has no effect. This Pokemon cannot use Fling successfully. Macho Brace, Power Anklet, Power Band, Power Belt, Power Bracer, Power Lens, and Power Weight still have their effects.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground. Gravity, Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball nullify the immunity.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon it hits with an attack. Does not affect Doom Desire and Future Sight.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: If an active ally has this Ability or the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: This Pokemon has a random stat raised by 2 stages and another stat lowered by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and knocks out another Pokemon.

abilities.name: Multiscale
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.

abilities.name: Multitype
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate or Z-Crystal.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Mummy. Does not affect the Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down,  Stance Change, and Zen Mode Abilities.

abilities.name: Normalize
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves are changed to be Normal type and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes before other effects that change a move's type.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted. Gaining this Ability while affected cures it.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to powder moves and damage from Sandstorm or Hail.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Grass-type attack.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon that makes contact with it. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move; Sheer Force prevents it from activating if the move has a secondary effect.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has no item, it finds one used by an adjacent Pokemon this turn.

abilities.name: Pixilate
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.description: If an active ally has this Ability or the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Status moves have priority raised by 1, but Dark types are immune.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is the target of an opposing Pokemon's move, that move loses one additional PP.

abilities.name: Protean
abilities.description: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the move it is about to use. This effect comes after all effects that change a move's type.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage if hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type attack.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have their power multiplied by 1.2. Does not affect Struggle.

abilities.name: Refrigerate
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: This Pokemon restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it switches out.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks have their power multiplied by 1.25 against targets of the same gender or multiplied by 0.75 against targets of the opposite gender. There is no modifier if either this Pokemon or the target is genderless.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: This Pokemon can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

abilities.name: Simple
abilities.description: When this Pokemon's stat stages are raised or lowered, the effect is doubled instead.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.

abilities.name: Stall
abilities.description: This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to flinch have a 10% chance to flinch.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Bug-type attack.

abilities.name: Symbiosis
abilities.description: If an ally uses its item, this Pokemon gives its item to that ally immediately. Does not activate if the ally's item was stolen or knocked off.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If another Pokemon burns, paralyzes, poisons, or badly poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon receives the same major status condition.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have their power multiplied by 1.5. Does affect Struggle.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokemon does not take damage from attacks made by its allies.

abilities.name: Teravolt
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Water-type attack.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.description: On switch-in, or when this Pokemon acquires this ability, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent opposing Pokemon's Ability. However, if one or more adjacent Pokemon has the Ability 'No Ability', Trace won't copy anything even if there is another valid Ability it could normally copy. Otherwise, if there is no Ability that can be copied at that time, this Ability will activate as soon as an Ability can be copied. Abilities that cannot be copied are the previously mentioned 'No Ability', as well as Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Schooling, Stance Change, Trace, and Zen Mode.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.description: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

abilities.name: Turboblaze
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's Attack, Special Attack, and accuracy stat stages when taking damage, and ignores other Pokemon's Defense, Special Defense, and evasiveness stat stages when dealing damage.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: If this Pokemon loses its held item for any reason, its Speed is doubled. This boost is lost if it switches out or gains a new item or Ability.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: If this Pokemon, but not its substitute, is struck by a critical hit, its Attack is raised by 12 stages.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries. Activation message broadcasts before other abilities regardless of the Pokemon's Speed tiers.

abilities.name: Battery
abilities.description: This Pokemon's allies have the power of their special attacks multiplied by 1.3.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: When this Pokemon has more than 1/2 its maximum HP and takes damage from an attack bringing it to 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, its Special Attack is raised by 1 stage. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move; Sheer Force prevents it from activating if the move has a secondary effect.

abilities.name: Comatose
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be statused, and is considered to be asleep. Moongeist Beam, Sunsteel Strike, and the Mold Breaker, Teravolt, and Turboblaze Abilities cannot ignore this Ability.

abilities.name: Corrosion
abilities.description: This Pokemon can poison or badly poison other Pokemon regardless of their typing.

abilities.name: Dancer
abilities.description: After another Pokemon uses a dance move, this Pokemon uses the same move. Moves used by this Ability cannot be copied again.

abilities.name: Dazzling
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, priority moves from opposing Pokemon targeted at allies are prevented from having an effect.

abilities.name: Disguise
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is a Mimikyu, the first hit it takes in battle deals 0 neutral damage. Its disguise is then broken and it changes to Busted Form. Confusion damage also breaks the disguise.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.description: This Pokemon receives 1/2 damage from contact moves, but double damage from Fire moves.

abilities.name: Galvanize
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.

abilities.name: Merciless
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks are critical hits if the target is poisoned.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Defense stat stage.

abilities.name: Receiver
abilities.description: This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints. Abilities that cannot be copied are Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, and Zen Mode.

abilities.name: Schooling
abilities.description: On switch-in, if this Pokemon is a Wishiwashi that is level 20 or above and has more than 1/4 of its maximum HP left, it changes to School Form. If it is in School Form and its HP drops to 1/4 of its maximum HP or less, it changes to Solo Form at the end of the turn. If it is in Solo Form and its HP is greater than 1/4 its maximum HP at the end of the turn, it changes to School Form.

abilities.name: Soul-Heart
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 1 stage when another Pokemon faints.

abilities.name: Stakeout
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacking stat is doubled against a target that switched in this turn.

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a move.

abilities.name: Steelworker
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Steel-type attack.

abilities.name: Triage
abilities.description: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

abilities.name: Neuroforce
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks that are super effective against the target do 1.25x damage.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents adjacent opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping or are airborne.

abilities.name: Mountaineer
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.

abilities.name: Rebound
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon blocks certain status moves and instead uses the move against the original user.

abilities.name: Persistent
abilities.description: The duration of Gravity, Heal Block, Magic Room, Safeguard, Tailwind, Trick Room, and Wonder Room is increased by 2 turns if the effect is started by this Pokemon.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.description: This Pokemon and its allies cannot be affected by Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, or Torment.

abilities.name: Aura Break
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of the Dark Aura and Fairy Aura Abilities are reversed, multiplying the power of Dark- and Fairy-type moves, respectively, by 3/4 instead of 1.33.

abilities.name: Bad Dreams
abilities.description: Causes adjacent opposing Pokemon to lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn if they are asleep.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.description: If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, in addition to the Berry's effect.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

abilities.name: Color Change
abilities.description: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the last move that hit it, unless that type is already one of its types. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move; Sheer Force prevents it from activating if the move has a secondary effect.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

abilities.name: Light Metal
abilities.description: This Pokemon's weight is halved.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled unless one of the attacker's moves is already disabled.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: There is a 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will become infatuated if it is of the opposite gender.

abilities.name: Dark Aura
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, the power of Dark-type moves used by active Pokemon is multiplied by 1.33.

abilities.name: Delta Stream
abilities.description: On switch-in, the weather becomes strong winds that remove the weaknesses of the Flying type from Flying-type Pokemon. This weather remains in effect until this Ability is no longer active for any Pokemon, or the weather is changed by Desolate Land or Primordial Sea.

abilities.name: Desolate Land
abilities.description: On switch-in, the weather becomes extremely harsh sunlight that prevents damaging Water-type moves from executing, in addition to all the effects of Sunny Day. This weather remains in effect until this Ability is no longer active for any Pokemon, or the weather is changed by Delta Stream or Primordial Sea.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move. The power of Fire-type moves is multiplied by 1.25 when used on this Pokemon. At the end of each turn, this Pokemon restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, if the weather is Rain, and loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, if the weather is Sun.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned, paralyzed, or fall asleep.

abilities.name: Fairy Aura
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, the power of Fairy-type moves used by active Pokemon is multiplied by 1.33.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.

abilities.name: Flare Boost
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is burned, the power of its special attacks is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves. The first time it is hit by a Fire-type move, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Fire-type attack as long as it remains active and has this Ability. If this Pokemon is frozen, it cannot be defrosted by Fire-type attacks.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is a Cherrim and Sunny Day is active, it changes to Sunshine Form and the Attack and Special Defense of it and its allies are multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Flower Veil
abilities.description: Grass-type Pokemon on this Pokemon's side cannot have their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon or have a major status condition inflicted on them by other Pokemon.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: This Pokemon's allies receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.

abilities.name: Fur Coat
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Defense is doubled.

abilities.name: Gale Wings
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, its Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

abilities.name: Grass Pelt
abilities.description: If Grassy Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: This Pokemon's weight is doubled.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.description: No competitive use.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: If Hail is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. This Pokemon takes no damage from Hail.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage. This Pokemon ignores a target's evasiveness stat stage.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot gain a major status condition and Rest will fail for it.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move. If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Electric-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself if it is within the range of that move.

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.description: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: This Pokemon blocks certain status moves and instead uses the move against the original user.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks. Curse and Substitute on use, Belly Drum, Pain Split, Struggle recoil, and confusion damage are considered direct damage.

abilities.name: Magma Armor
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.description: Prevents adjacent opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has a major status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Mega Launcher
abilities.description: This Pokemon's pulse moves have their power multiplied by 1.5. Heal Pulse restores 3/4 of a target's maximum HP, rounded half down.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and raises its Speed by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokemon has its major status condition cured when it switches out.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be confused. Gaining this Ability while confused cures it.

abilities.name: Parental Bond
abilities.description: This Pokemon's damaging moves become multi-hit moves that hit twice. The second hit has its damage quartered. Does not affect multi-hit moves or moves that have multiple targets.

abilities.name: Poison Heal
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is poisoned, it restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn instead of losing HP.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: This Pokemon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning.

abilities.name: Primordial Sea
abilities.description: On switch-in, the weather becomes heavy rain that prevents damaging Fire-type moves from executing, in addition to all the effects of Rain Dance. This weather remains in effect until this Ability is no longer active for any Pokemon, or the weather is changed by Delta Stream or Desolate Land.

abilities.name: Pure Power
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has a major status condition, its Speed is multiplied by 1.5; the Speed drop from paralysis is ignored.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle, Life Orb, and crash damage.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: No competitive use.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Ground-, Rock-, and Steel-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.3. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is multiplied by 1.25. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Grass-type moves and raises its Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.description: Prevents adjacent opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping or also have this Ability.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its major status condition cured at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have their power multiplied by 1.3, but the secondary effects are removed.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.description: This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times.

abilities.name: Slow Start
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is multiplied by 1.25. This Pokemon takes no damage from Hail.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Hail.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and it loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.description: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage at the end of each full turn it has been on the field.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is an Aegislash, it changes to Blade Forme before attempting to use an attacking move, and changes to Shield Forme before attempting to use King's Shield.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's attack.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move. If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Water-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself if it is within the range of that move.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.description: This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: This Pokemon and its allies cannot fall asleep.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: If a Pokemon uses a Fire- or Ice-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's attacking stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.description: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.

abilities.name: Toxic Boost

types.name: Dark
types.description: Pokemon of this type are immune to Status moves used by a Pokemon with the Prankster Ability, unless the Pokemon is an ally. These Pokemon can be hit by Psychic-type attacks if they are under the effect of Miracle Eye.

types.name: Electric
types.description: Pokemon of this type cannot become paralyzed.

types.name: Fire
types.description: Pokemon of this type cannot become burned.

types.name: Flying
types.description: Pokemon of this type are airborne and lose their Flying type until the end of the turn they use Roost. These Pokemon can be hit by Thousand Arrows despite it being a Ground-type attack.

types.name: Ghost
types.description: Pokemon of this type cannot be prevented from switching out by any effect. These Pokemon can be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks if they are under the effect of Foresight or Odor Sleuth, or if the attacker has the Scrappy Ability.

types.name: Grass
types.description: Pokemon of this type cannot become affected by Leech Seed and are immune to powder moves and the Effect Spore Ability.

types.name: Ground
types.description: Pokemon of this type are immune to damage from Sandstorm.

types.name: Ice
types.description: Pokemon of this type cannot become frozen and are immune to Sheer Cold and damage from Hail.

types.name: Poison
types.description: Pokemon of this type cannot become poisoned, except by a Pokemon with the Corrosion Ability, and remove Toxic Spikes from their side of the field if they are grounded as they switch in. These Pokemon cannot miss when using Toxic, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.

types.name: Rock
types.description: Pokemon of this type are immune to damage from Sandstorm and have their Special Defense multiplied by 1.5 during Sandstorm.

types.name: Steel
types.description: Pokemon of this type cannot become poisoned, except by a Pokemon with the Corrosion Ability, and are immune to damage from Sandstorm.

types.name: Water
types.description: Freeze-Dry is super effective against this type.
